annotations:
Good day,
Please propose suitable cargo for below vsl frm direct owner,
MV MINOAN SEA - OPENING KRISHNAPATNAM 03-05 OF SEPT
CAN TRY ANY, PREFER COASTAL
MV MINOAN SEA
-FLAG : LIBERIA
-IMO NO : 9623544
-VSLS CALL SIGN : 5LPB3
-BUILT : 2016
-TYPE : SDBC , GLESS
-CLASSIFICATION SOCIETY : ABS
-P+I : GARD
-SUMMER DWT / DRAFT : ABT 81,502 MTS / 14.45M SW
-GRT/NRT : 45,148/26,916
-LOA : 229.00 M
-BEAM : 32.26 M
-DEPTH MOULDED : 20.20 M
-GRAIN CAPACITY : ABT 97,035 CBM INCL HATCH SPACE
-HO/HA : 7/7 - SIDE ROLLING HATCH COVERS
-ALTERNATIVE LOADING : HOLDS 2,4,6 MAYBE EMPTY
-CO2 FITTED : YES
-BREAKDOWN OF HOLD CAP :
NO1: 13082.3
NO2: 14064.5
NO3: 14102.7
NO4: 14125.0
NO5: 14107.2
NO6: 14122.0
NO7: 13431.4
-TPC ON SUMMER DRAFT : ABT 73.60 MT
-HATCH DIMENSIONS :
H1: 14.08 x 13.20 x 2.57 mtrs
H2: 15.84 x 14.40 x 2.57 mtrs
H3: 15.84 x 14.40 x 2.57 mtrs
H4: 15.84 x 14.40 x 2.57 mtrs
H5: 15.84 x 14.40 x 2.57 mtrs
H6: 15.84 x 14.40 x 2.57 mtrs
H7: 15.84 x 14.40 x 2.57 mtrs
-  SPEED AND CONSUMPTION, AS DESCRIBED, ONLY APPLICABLE DURING PERIODS
OF  GOOD  WEATHER  DAYS OF 24 CONSECUTIVE HRS WITH SMOOTH SEA BEAUFORT
SCALE  4  AND  BELOW/DOUGLAS  SEA  STATE  3.0  (WIND  DRIVEN WAVES A/O
COMBINATION  OF  SAME  WITH  SWELL  NOT MORE THAN 1.25 METERS) WITHOUT
SWELL  AND/OR  OCEAN  CURRENTS  HAVING  A  NEGATIVE EFFECT ON VESSEL'S
WARRANTED SPEED.
- BALLAST: ABT 13.50 KNTS @ ABT 31.00 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.20 MT LSMGO
- LADEN  : ABT 13.00 KNTS @ ABT 34.00 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.20 MT LSMGO
ECO SPD/CONS :
- BALLAST: ABT 12,00 KNTS @ ABT 25.50 MT VSLFO + ABT 0,20MT LSMGO
- LADEN  : ABT 11,50 KNTS @ ABT 26.50 MT VLSFO + ABT 0,20MT LSMGO
- PORT CONSUMPTION IDLE:  ABT 4.5 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.20 MT LSMGO
- PORT CONSUMPTION WORKING: ABT 5.5 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.2 MT LSMGO
FAVOURABLE CURRENTS NOT TO BE TAKEN INTO CONSIDERATION ON VSL'S
PERFORMANCE ANALYSIS.
- IN COLD CLIMATES A/O BALLAST/DEBALLAST : ADDITIONAL 1.5 MT VLSFO/D
-  VSL  ENTITLED  TO  USE LSMGO AT NARROW/SHALLOW WATERS/CANALS/RIVERS
RESTRICTED/BUSY  WATER  AREAS/ENGINE  STARTING-STOPPING  AND OPERATING
UNDER LOW LOAD.
- BUNKER SPECIFICATIONS:
IFO RMG 180 OR 380 TO ISO 8217-2017 SPECS OR SUBSEQUENT AMNDMTS MGO DMA TO
ISO 8217-2017 SPECS OR SUBSEQUENT AMNDMTS. SULPHUR CONTENT AS PER STATUTORY REQUIREMENTS
- BWTS FITTED
ALL DETAILS ABOUT AND GIVEN IN GD FAITH
Best Regards
Sen
MARINE BIZ INTERNATIONAL – CHARTERING
INDIA
Mobile : +91 988 42 92 32 6
Email : chartering@marinebiz.in

wish to receive any further Newsletter from us, please reply REMOVE.
